remarks: Lemma for ~ ringlidm and ~ ringridm .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement:
rngidm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
rngidm.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
rngidm.u $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
ringidmlem $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( .1. .x. X ) = X /\ ( X .x. .1. ) = X ) ) $.
